abstract: The Swedish bank said that it had identified transactions by Mr. Wolf that could constitute a “criminal offense.”
snippet: The Swedish bank said that it had identified transactions by Mr. Wolf that could constitute a “criminal offense.”
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Michael Wolf, who was ousted as Swedbank’s chief executive this week, has been referred to financial prosecutors in Sweden for suspicion of violating market abuse laws, the bank confirmed on Friday.

headline.main: Ex-Swedbank C.E.O. Referred to Prosecutors for Potential Market Abuses
